titles.title: I am destined for a kingdom,

authors.author: Mike Alexander Â© 1997 Mike Alexander 21 Blay Road Calista WA 6167

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I am destined for a kingdom,
Anointed by the Lord,
Made for glory, He's preparing me to reign.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am called to judge the angels,
And I know I'm being restored,
To the vision that God gave in Jesus' Name.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In Jesus' Name I soar on wings like eagles,
In Jesus' Name I'm full of power in the Son;
As I lift His Name on high
And my spirit starts to cry,
He is here, He is here, and He is Lord!
